page.title: 05NEWS FROM KILSYTH CHRONICLE
page.content:
{CHURCH CENTENARY The Methodist Church in Kilsyth is 100 years old this year. It cost Â£1684 to build and was erected on the site of an earlier church. To mark the occasion the Methodist Church Synod in Scotland held their meeting in Kilsyth and the District Council gave them a civic reception.
{HOLIDAY FOR ADAM Four year old Adam Hoggan from Twechar suffers from hydrocephalus and spina bifida. He and his family have been able to go on holiday to Butlins Ayr thanks to the generosity of Twechar United Football Club.
